author: rwesten
msg: minor: Just changed some logging levels to reduce the messages on INFO level. THe OpenNLP Chunker and Pos engine now keep ad-hoc Tags (unmapped String Tags). This is also to make loggings more meaningful as only the first time that such a Tag appear an INFO message is written to the log. The goal ist to make is more easy to find those Tags by using grebs over the log files

author: rwesten
msg: fix for STANBOL-830 and impplementation of STANBOL-831: The EventJobManager is no capable to concurrently process multiple ContentItems with the same URI

author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-734: Deprecated the OpenNLP specific helper for text processing in favor of the AnalyzedText contentPart

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4158: When a core is registering in ZooKeeper it may not wait long enough to find the leader due to how long the potential leader waits to see replicas.
